comment.author: 41311545@N05
comment._content:
Same comment as previous entry, it's Improved Town Class cruiser  HMAS Adelaide RAN 1922, scrapped 1949. The warship on the left in Farm Cove is probably cruiser HMAS Brisbane, but could also be Sydney or Melbourne. 

The proto precedes the Sydney Harbour Bridge construction which started 1927, so the photo is taken between Audelaide's commissioning in August 1922 and, say, 1927-28.
